tool_description:
Scrap your favourite articles through wide amount of sites including the premium articles.
sample of these sites:
‘medium’, ‘bbc’, ‘cnn’, ‘wikipedia’, ‘nytimes’, ‘freecodecamp’, ‘towardsdatascience’, 'substack'
Don't miss all information in tutorials section:
https://rapidapi.com/odlica-odlica-default/api/article-scraper2/tutorials
name: article scraper
title: article scraper

api_list.name: scrape
api_list.description: Provide a link for the target article to be scraped
